com.aionemu.commons.scripting
Interface ScriptContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScriptContextImpl
public interface ScriptContext

This class represents script context that can be loaded, unloaded, etc...

Method Summary

          Adds child contexts to this context.

          Tests if this ScriptContext is equal to another ScriptContext.

Method Detail

init

void init()
Initializes script context. Calls the compilation task.
After compilation static methods marked with OnClassLoad are invoked

shutdown

void shutdown()
Notifies all script classes that they must save their data and release resources to prevent memory leaks. It's done via static methods with OnClassUnload annotation

reload

void reload()
Invokes shutdown(), after that invokes init(). Root folder remains the same, but new compiler and classloader are used.

getRoot

java.io.File getRoot()
Returns the root directory for script engine. Only one script engine per root directory is allowed.

Returns:
root directory for script engine

getCompilationResult

CompilationResult getCompilationResult()
Returns compilation result of this script context

Returns:
compilation result

isInitialized

boolean isInitialized()
Returns true if this script context is loaded

Returns:
true if context is initialized

setLibraries

void setLibraries(java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> files)
Sets files that represents jar files, they will be used as libraries

Parameters:
files - that points to jar file, will be used as libraries

getLibraries

java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> getLibraries()
Returns list of files that are used as libraries for this script context

Returns:
list of libraries

getParentScriptContext

ScriptContext getParentScriptContext()
Returns parent script context of this context. Returns null if none.

Returns:
parent Script context of this context or null

getChildScriptContexts

java.util.Collection<ScriptContext> getChildScriptContexts()
Returns list of child contexts or null if no contextes present

Returns:
list of child contexts or null

addChildScriptContext

void addChildScriptContext(ScriptContext context)
Adds child contexts to this context. If this context is initialized - chiled context will be initialized immideatly. In other case child context will be just added and initialized when init() would be called. Duplicated child contexts are not allowed, in such case child will be ignored

Parameters:
context - child context

setClassListener

void setClassListener(ClassListener cl)
Sets the class listener for this script context.

Parameters:
cl - class listener

getClassListener

ClassListener getClassListener()
Returns class listener associated with this ScriptContext.
If it's null - returns parent classListener.
If parent is null and classListener is null - it will set DefaultClassListener as class listener and return it

Returns:
Associated class listener

setCompilerClassName

void setCompilerClassName(java.lang.String className)
Sets compiler class name for this script context.
Compiler is not inherrited by children.

Parameters:
className - compiler class name

getCompilerClassName

java.lang.String getCompilerClassName()
Returns compiler class name that will be used for this script context.

Returns:
compiler class name that will be used for tis script context

equals

boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Tests if this ScriptContext is equal to another ScriptContext. Comparation is done by comparing root files and parent contexts (if there is any parent)

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
obj - object to compare with
Returns:
result of comparation

hashCode

int hashCode()
Returns hashCoded of this ScriptContext. Hashcode is calculated using root file and parent context(if available)

Overrides:
hashCode in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
hashcode

finalize

void finalize()
              throws java.lang.Throwable
This method overrides finalization to ensure that active script context will not be collected by GC. If such situation happens - shutdown() is called to ensure that resources were released.

Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - if something goes wrong during finalization
